articles.title: Deadly Manhattan Office Building Shooting: Motive and Victims Emerge
articles.description: A gunman opened fire in a Midtown Manhattan skyscraper, killing four people, including an off-duty NYPD officer, before taking his own life. Investigators found a second suicide note in Las Vegas, and the suspect reportedly blamed the NFL for his actions, claiming to suffer from CTE. [1, 3, 9, 11, 12, 13]
articles.source: NBC News / ABC World News Tonight / Democracy Now! / CTV News
articles.link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_y_0_y_0_0 (Example, as specific article links are not provided, but video links for news broadcasts are)

articles.title: Powerful 8.8 Magnitude Earthquake Off Russia Triggers Pacific Tsunami Warnings
articles.description: An 8.8 magnitude earthquake struck off Russia's Far East, prompting tsunami advisories and warnings across the Pacific, including Japan, Hawaii, the U.S. West Coast, and British Columbia. Waves up to 3-4 meters high were reported in Russia, with smaller waves reaching other areas. [3, 4, 8, 12, 17]
articles.source: NBC News / The Standard (HK) / KGW / CTV News
articles.link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_y_0_y_0_0 (Example, as specific article links are not provided, but video links for news broadcasts are)

articles.title: Gaza Faces 'Worst-Case Scenario of Famine' as UK Threatens Palestinian State Recognition
articles.description: The world's leading hunger monitoring system has warned that Gaza is experiencing a 'worst-case scenario of famine,' with widespread starvation and malnutrition. In response, the UK has announced it will recognize Palestine as a state unless Israel agrees to a ceasefire and improves the situation in Gaza. [1, 5, 9, 10, 12, 13, 16]
articles.source: NBC News / Global News / Democracy Now! / The Hindu / CTV News / PBS NewsHour
articles.link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_y_0_y_0_0 (Example, as specific article links are not provided, but video links for news broadcasts are)
